column5: Hello,  Well, i finally got the OK to spend a few bucs on a boat (roughly $4000), but here's the catch.  The wife wants a boat that she can suntan on and be able to do some water sports, me on the other hand, I want it for fishing and fishing only.  Any suggestions on what kinda  boat would meet both our needs?  Also is there any other place to look besides Autotrader, Kijiji, and Ebay?  Thanks for your help
You can fish out of anything, and she can catch a sun tan in anything.  Take her with you when you look/buy to make sure she likes it... then buy a big "tube" to drag her around the lake in.

That`s what my wife and boys said tubing/waterskiing, I wanted a pure fishing platform but I did the compromise thing. Now guess how many times the boat has been used for tubing/watersking in 3 years?? you guessed it... ZERO!
suntan bed 29 Jul 2009 ... like new suntan bed used very little 550.00 obo 480-209-4312  now you can buy buy any boat you want

You can get a 1990 or so 17', 60-75  Fish & Ski type of aluminum boat for that price, buddy just picked up a 1991 Sylvan 17' Snapper of some kind w 91 75hp Mariner for 3500.00...Console , Depth Finder, Livewell, Swivel base seats..stereo, trailer and safety equip.  Planes out @ 37 mph pull a tube around no problem and can easily have a sunbather on the front deck. Look around and go for a ride to marinas and boat repair shops.. even around the block... STEALS ARE NEVER ADVERTISED!!!  Have fun shopping!!  RFS
Always remember these words "It's Cheaper to Keep Her"........
